title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.73 - Public record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.73 - Public record

State Regulations

The record as defined in sections
263.70
and
263.71
of this Part shall
constitute the public record of the case and shall be made available for
inspection or copying under such conditions as the board may prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.73

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
